Thanks for playing!
We hope you enjoyed it and someday you will come back.
Pause?
What are you doing here? Go play.
Coffee won't help you.
Do you pause match-3 as well?
Dam, and you still have an interview to pass.
Are you sure you want to be a game designer?
These tasks are from the USSR kindergarten..
Impudent mortal! So you are here at last!
Deal with all the evil tricks my minions will put upon you and get the {Spark of Intelligence}! Fail to do so and fall into [oblivion].
Let us begin!
Greetingsss, human! I was the mightiest of all the warriors once! Answer my questions right and I will fall.
You are wise, human! The next question.
Suffer the [pain], human!
Arghhhhhh...
You have perished. Watch video AD to come back to life.
Stand still! Now I small smite you down with the vicious blow!,
Hail to thee, human. I sold my soul in pursuit of black arts mastery! Shall you answer all of my riddles I would collapse in shame.
Thou are correct. Let us proceed.
Suffer the [pain], human!
I collaaapppsss...
You have perished. Watch video AD to come back to life.
Despair not! Even the weariest river flows somewhere safe to sea..,
Weak human, you are unlikely to answer MY questions, for I am the great Ozymouth itself.
How can you be right? The next question!
Suffer the [pain], human!
Hubschsch...
You have perished. Watch video AD to come back to life.
Lament! Close you eyes and forget your pain...,

I may deal critical damage with Value1% chance for each strike. 
 What are the chances of getting Value2 criticals in a row?
In Marshlands Value1 adventurers die by the [sword], Value2 by the [dagger] and Value3 by [stray arrows]. What is the chance to die there from the good old <melee weapon>?
In Marshlands Value1 adventurers die by the [sword], Value2 by the [dagger] and Value3 by [stray arrows]. What is the chance to die there from the good old <melee weapon>?

Each of two members of Thieves Guild may <pickpocket> the nobleman with an armored guard Value1 times out of Value2. What is the chance that at least one of them would make it out of the tavern alive?

Five adventurers need to defend the wood house against [goblin raiders]. One of them shall guard the door, one the rear exit, one the front door and two are needed for both windows.
What is the numer of possible <defending formations> if all the adventurers are equally capable of defending each point?

Adventurers may cross the <woodland> afoot or astride, the <reverland> afoot, astride or by the raft and the <swampland> astride or using the underground caves. In how many ways can the party plan their <journey>?

I can [slash] you with my sword blade, [pierce] you with its edge, [stun] you with its hilt, [scratch] you with its tip or lunge and [impale] you. How many Value2-hit <combos> with different <strikes> can I perform?

A sorceress and her twin sister attack you from two sides. One with the <Icebolt spell> that may hit either you or her sister. Another with the [torch] with Value2% chance to hit. What is the chance of turning into the deeply frosen and badly burnt corpse?

Each of the crates contains Value1 <potions>. {Iron crate} contains Value2 [heal potions], Wooden crate contains only Value3,  [Blood crate] contains Value4 of these. You get a random <potion> from each of them. What is the chance of drinking 3 [heal potions]?

Elven archer got Value1 <oil arrows>, Value2 {poison arrows} and Value3 [fire arrows] in his quiver. He randomly picks them one by one and shoots at you. Elven archers are really fast and they never miss their target. What is the chance of being <oiled> and then [set afire]?
Elf, human, halfling, orc, dwarf and lizardman are held captive in my keep and are to be [sacrificed] to the Demon Lord one after another.  In how many ways can these [sacrifices] be made?
